import React, { useState } from "react"; import {Container,Row,Col,Form,FormGroup,Button} from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import '../styles/login.css' import registerImg from '../assets/images/register.png' import userIcon from '../assets/images/user.png' const Register =()=>{ const [credentials,setCredentials]=useState({ userName:undefined, email:undefined, password:undefined, }) const handleChange=e=>{ console.log("Changing:", e.target.id, e.target.value); setCredentials((prev)=>({...prev,[e.target.id]:e.target.value})) }; const handleClick=e=>{ e.preventDefault() } return(
